title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 253.18 - Hearings; motions; objections
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 253.18 - Hearings; motions; objections

State Regulations

Motions made during a hearing and objections with respect
to the conduct of a hearing, including objections to the introduction of
evidence, shall be stated orally and shall be included in the stenographic
report of the hearing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
253.18

Renumbered from 253.44

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
